sourcesContent: import{useEffect as t,useState as e}from"react";import r from"../use-ssr";import{getId as o}from"../utils/collections";const n=t=>{const e=document.createElement("div");return e.setAttribute("id",t),e};export default(s=o(),u)=>{const c=`nextui-${s}`,{isBrowser:i}=r(),[l,m]=e(i?n(c):null);return t((()=>{const t=(u?u():null)||document.body,e=t.querySelector(`#${c}`),r=e||n(c);e||t.appendChild(r),m(r)}),[]),l};
